headline.main: Consumer Notes; Paterson Is Dropping Blue Cross; Weighs Setting Up Its Own Plan

docs.abstract: Amer Cancer Soc NJ div endorses natl orgn's program for restricting smoking in public places (S)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor Lawrence F. Kramer of Paterson said yesterday that his city was dropping Blue Cross-Blue Shield health coverage for 1,400 city employees and would save half a million dollars over two years as a result.
docs.snippet: Mayor Lawrence F. Kramer of Paterson said yesterday that his city was  dropping Blue Cross-Blue Shield health coverage for 1,400 city employees and would save half a million dollars over two years as a result.
